name: Join the Dots — Fun Puzzle Game
name_original: Join the Dots — Fun Puzzle Game
description: The most important thing in this game is to tie the same colored balls. This is the way to get really far. Can you handle all 12 difficulty levels and 150 different levels? These are neon paths, where you have to make the most of the clicks to link each part. If you fail to do so, you will need to start from the beginning. We believe you can do it and you will really get very far. Find a way to get it as close as possible.
